name: neuron-bootstrap-colors
description: Webpack with stylelint config. Updated on 22.1.2023
author: AIS SERVIS, S.R.O

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css && npm run prod
scripts.bundle:css: npm run bundle:lightness.css && npm run bundle:darken-lighten.css && npm run bundle:bootstrap-sample.css
scripts.bundle:bootstrap-sample.css: npm run compile:bootstrap-sample.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/bootstrap-sample.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/bootstrap-sample.min.css
scripts.bundle:darken-lighten.css: npm run compile:darken-lighten.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/darken-lighten.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/darken-lighten.min.css
scripts.bundle:lightness.css: npm run compile:lightness.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/lightness.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/lightness.min.css
scripts.compile:scss: npm run stylelint npm run compile:lightness.scss && npm run compile:darken-lighten.scss && npm run compile:bootstrap-sample.scss
scripts.watch:scss: npm run bundle:css & watch "npm run bundle:css" Resources/SCSS
